content: This is a placeholder to gather the takeaways for the Caries Risk assessment valueset
Track is breaking for lunch and re-convening at 2:30 in the main room. Enjoy.

Some notes from the morning non-technical session:

  1. Group recommend expanding the caries value set to include also the equivalent SNODENT and ICD-10. Jean N. helping us find this. Thanks @Jean Narcisi
  2. Allow for an text explanation for a coded caries risk but don't allow for text if a code is not selected. Therefore, in the Dental Risk Assessment, keep disallow (change note to text 0..0), and disallow (change note 0...0), and keep QualitativeRisk 0..1 but change the codeable concept to make coding 1...1 and text 0..1.
  3. Recommend the Dental Risk Assessment as a "MAY" in the bundle.
Question for this afternoon: Should we model this as a risk or assessment or is this just an observation?
